name: ironweed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tall wild plant with purple or pink flowers that grows in tropical and warm regions: Ironweed grows in moist lowlands and is tall. She watched a butterfly land on the flowers of an ironweed plant.
More examplesFewer examplesIronweed is one of the few plants that will survive under Black Walnut trees.The spray is effective in controlling ironweed, and eliminating the plants from the pasture.The fields were overflowing with cow parsley, ironweed, and asters.Ironweed grows 1 to 2 metres tall and 30 to 60 centimetres wide.
